divine divinity blends classic rpg elements with an immersive  and well written storyline offering a nostalgic isometric experience its intuitive combat and deep character customization stand out despite dated graphics and some clunky interfaces this game is a hidden gem for fans of oldschool rpgs promising a rich enchanting adventure
